about.label: About me
about.description:
Hey there! I'm Sebastián, a software developer with an affinity for all things related to web development. I've been creating things on the internet since my teenage years, toying around with game APIs and Python scripts. Fast forward to today, I've got studies in software engineering, and I've gained valuable work experience as a developer under my belt.

Most of my work experience has been focused on frontend development, making it the best skill in my toolbox. However, I love to dabble on both sides of development, especially when it comes to personal projects with the MERN stack.

I'm a firm believer in constantly learning and evolving, and I always strive to stay up-to-date with the latest technologies and industry trends. When I'm not busy coding, chances are you can find me lifting weights, swimming or playing some video games.

descriptions: Built and shipped internal tools built on React to assist in critical bussiness processes.
Mantained and extended functionalities behind our Node microservices.
Worked on an e-commerce platform migration project, transitioning from a monolithic architecture to a service-oriented one built on Next.js.
Developed a BI web platform built on React for shareholders and strategic partners of the company.
Communicated and worked with cross-organizational and multi-disciplinary teams of data engineers, back-end enginners, UI/UX designers and product owners.

list.title: Portfolio
list.description: This very website you're looking at right now! Built with React and Next.js.

list.title: Beddit
list.description: A reddit clone with Next.js as a full stack framework, featuring authentication, subreddits, multitype content posts, comments trees, voting and moderating systems.

list.title: Chatterbox
list.description: A real time chatroom app built on Next.js and NestJS, featuring dynamic text channels and online users system.

list.title: Weathery
list.description: A lightweight weather PWA built with React and Tailwind CSS, featuring zero js dependencies other than React.
